cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8)
project(fcl)
include(CompilerSettings)
set (FCL_INCLUDE_DIRS "include" 
                    "${CCD_INCLUDE_DIR}"
                    "${ANN_INCLUDE_DIR}")
include_directories(${FCL_INCLUDE_DIRS})
file (GLOB FCL_SRC "src/*.cpp")

add_library(fcl STATIC ${FCL_SRC})
